Class DeleteSessionController

java.lang.Object
main.java.com.team.game.controller.DeleteSessionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class DeleteSessionController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the Delete Session view.

Allows users to select or manually enter a session ID to delete. Lists all saved game sessions for the logged-in user and delegates deletion logic to GameService.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      JavaFX lifecycle hook. Initializes the game service and user references, loads the user's saved sessions, and sets up event listeners.

    • handleDelete

      public void handleDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles deletion of the selected or entered session. Displays a confirmation dialog before removing it via GameService.deleteSession(int).
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the originating UI event
